text: P. Rajavelu, Minister for Social Welfare and Adi Dravidar Welfare, on Saturday, declared open the Adi Dravidar hostel constructed at a cost of Rs. 2.60 crore here. P.R. Siva, Minister for Fisheries, laid the foundation for the construction of additional class rooms and laboratory at Karaikal Avvai Government College for Women.
title: Hostel declared open
